description:
Advocating for those injured through no fault of their own, we offer dedicated personal injury services at AJ Serafini, Partner of The Poole Law Group. With office locations in Frederick, Maryland, and Hagerstown, we tirelessly pursue financial justice on behalf of people in Washington, Frederick and Allegany counties, as well as throughout the state. Our law firm accepts credit cards.

Striving to see those we represent made as close to financially whole as possible after suffering injuries due to the careless or reckless actions of others, we assist clients with a wide range of complex accident and negligence injury claims. Our experience includes representing clients with matters such as the following:

  • Car and trucking accidents
  • Birth injuries, medical malpractice and nursing home abuse
  • Animal bites
  • Wrongful death

Our law firm also handles premises liability, toxic torts, class actions and injury claims involving issues such as asbestos and mesothelioma, toxic mold, and aviation and mass transit accidents.

At AJ Serafini, Partner of The Poole Law Group, we recognize the physical, emotional and financial toll that brain injuries and other accident injuries may take on people and their families. We work closely with our clients, exploring every option to help them obtain the damages they need and deserve, so they can focus on what matters most - their recovery. Our law firm offers free initial consultations and virtual appointments.
